Nice to meet you, I'm Matt

Nice to meet you, I’m Matt, the owner of Uplift Painting and Decorating. I have been been painting for over 10 years now and am looking forward to being able to help with any of your painting needs. I take pride in my work, always properly preparing surfaces and using high quality materials such as Dulux paints, this means you always end up with a high quality job..
